long_description: Take a comprehensive look at the varying terrain of hundreds of trails in Pennsylvania's scenic wilderness. Editor: Ben Kramer. Softcover; 236 pages; black-and-white maps. Keystone Trails Association; copyright 2007. Updated guide is broken down into 9 geographical hiking regions, ranging from the secluded to the scenic. Includes directions to each hike, suggested times and seasons, descriptions of terrain, maintenance updates and special features. Features addresses to obtain maps, guides and current information.
short_description: Take a comprehensive look at the varying terrain of hundreds of trails in Pennsylvania's scenic wilderness.
